project_plan.name: Weather Fetcher CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to fetch current weather information from a public API.
Parse and display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.
Write tests to verify that the weather fetching functionality works correctly.
Execute tests to ensure all implemented features work as expected.
